name: Virtual Cube
description:
Learnt how to solve a real Rubiks cube, and thought it would be a fun challenge to try to build a virtual one... This was not easy to build / solve xD

Controls are all swiping.

Swiping left / right / up down off of the cube will rotate the whole thing

Single vertical / horizontal swipes will do left/right/up/down for that row/column

If you pick an edge piece and kinda swipe in an arch, it will do a forward face rotation clockwise/anticlockwise (PS. this isn't 100% perfect yet)

Features I'm thinking of adding:

Auto Solve

Algorithm Hints

Custom cube builder to help you solve real rubiks cubes

Open to any suggestions :)
